author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Times of India Theater Fest this weekend
text:
Here's what to expect at the Times of India Theater Fest this weekend
Nine Parts of Desire: September 25, 7.30 pm at Jyothi Nivas Auditorium
Directed by Lillette Dubey, starring Ira Dubey
Einstein: September 26, 7 pm at Joythi Nivas Auditorium
Directed by and starring Naseeruddin Shah
Mera Woh Matlab Nahi Tha: September 27, 7 pm at Joythi Nivas Auditorium
Directed by Rakesh Bedi, starring Anupam Kher and Neena Gupta
